summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.

headline: Cognizant Unveils Artificial Intelligence Lab and Cognizant Moment™ Studio in Bengaluru
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) today announced the opening of its India Artificial Intelligence (AI) Lab alongside a new Cognizant MomentTM Studio in Bengaluru—forming an innovation hub that advances the company's AI builder strategy. Both the lab and studio are part of the commitment Cognizant announced in 2023 to invest $1 billion in generative AI over the next three years.
